section.p: This template represents observations relating intellectual and mental powers and state of mind. Mental status observations in a clinical note often have a psychological focus (e.g., level of consciousness, mood, anxiety level, reasoning ability).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:29186, CONF:29187 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.125"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:29182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:29183)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:29188)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Mental Status Observation Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:29189)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:29194)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:29195)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Mental and Functional Status Response 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.44 DYNAMIC (CONF:29202)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:31435)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:29207, CONF:29208, CONF:29209)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:29182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:29183)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:29188)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Mental Status Observation Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:29189)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:29194)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:29195)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Mental and Functional Status Response 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.44 DYNAMIC (CONF:29202)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:31435)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:29207, CONF:29208, CONF:29209)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Assessment Scale Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.125"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.125"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1187787401"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1619890352"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="395711134"/> <code code="1200907535"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.69"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="453942331"/> <code code="1909347516"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author/> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.86"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="153044477"/> <code code="392862484"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <referenceRange> <observationRange/> </referenceRange> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>
